name: Cyberpunk 2077: Gangs of Night City
description:
A big box strategy with miniatures where gangs fight for control of a city.  The city is also a living part of the game.

Players assume the role of gang leader where you organize your gang members to take power in the city.  Your actions affect not only your game and your opponents but the city itself.  Each gang has different attributes and goals and so will give players a different gaming experience.
